overview:
Jiyoun (Lizzy) Lee is Co-founder and VP Service Ops at Shakr Media.

Lizzy was a former engineer at Daelim Construction, who left for more exciting times at Zenitum.

While at Zenitum, Lizzy was responsible for service planning. After moving to a new department at Zenitum (yes, the startup had departments… what the?!?!), she began working with David Lee… who she would later join at his startup, Shakr Media.

At Shakr Media, Lizzy is an expert at navigating the minefield of bureaucracy in Korea.
